answerText: Homage to Catalonia[10] In this essay by the author of Homage to Catalonia, the narrator reluctantly kills a rampaging animal while working as a police officer in Burma.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 6 | 17 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This work describes the author's experiences as part of the ILP Contingent. For 10 points each: [10] Name this account of the author's experiences during the Spanish Civil War as a member of the POUM.
